about.title: About Us
about.description: SoccerSpot is the best place to book your next soccer game. We provide a simple and easy-to-use platform for players to find and book soccer fields in their area. Our mission is to make it easy for everyone to play soccer, anytime and anywhere.

booking.title: Easy Booking
booking.description: Find and book your next game with just a few clicks.

localGames.title: Local Games
localGames.description: Discover games happening in your local area.

connect.title: Connect with Players
connect.description: Connect with other players, form teams, and enjoy the game.

intro.title: Welcome to SoccerSpot
intro.description: The best place to book your next soccer game.
